body:
Hello I'm new here!
I'm a sophmore in high school.
Some other games I play are CSGO, ROTMG, Dungeon defenders, skyrim.

My favorite T.V. Show is big brother
my favorite contestant from big brother is meg maley (picture) http://imgur.com/rPhuNRp
I am also a moderator on the HellsGamers CSGO servers :)

If you have any questions feel free to contact any staff member and they will be happy to assist you!

Enjoy your stay! ^.^
